title: Investors Favor Short-Term Senegal Bonds as Debt Concerns Linger
description: Investors preferred short-term Senegal bonds at an auction Friday as concerns over its long-term debt sustainability linger.
content: Investors preferred short-term Senegal bonds at an auction Friday as concerns over its long-term debt sustainability linger.
